name: Vectras VM Image
summary: Learn about .VBI files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Vectras VM is based on QEMU and allows users to run full operating systems, such as Linux distributions, inside a virtual environment on their phone or tablet. Advanced users or hobbyists who want to run full desktop or server environments on Android are the primary users of Vectras VM and VBI files.

Users can choose VBI files to load in Vectras VM; the app then runs the prebuilt operating systems without requiring users to manually set up disk images or parameters. Vectras VM also supports a related file type, CVBI, which serves a similar purpose and can be imported the same way. Both formats help simplify the process of launching virtual machines on mobile devices.

description: A VBI file is a virtual machine (VM) image used by xoureldeen Vectras VM, a virtualization app for Android devices. It stores the contents of a virtual machine, including the operating system, and any installed software or data.

instructions: You can open VBI files with Vectras VM on an Android device using its ROM Manager, which provides tools for importing and managing custom virtual machines. When you select a VBI file in the app, Vectras VM automatically sets up the virtual machine using default settings, or you can customize the configuration.
